thread.title: Great location if you want to get to stade francais and still be able to get to city centre
thread.title_full: Great location if you want to get to stade francais and still be able to get to city centre - Review of Courtyard Paris Saint Denis, Saint-Denis, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jo G
title: Great location if you want to get to stade francais and still be able to get to city centre
text:
A good standard of hotel, variety of drinks and food available. Breakfast covers most requirements I'm sure
Yes the hotel is a way away from main city, in an area of offices, but we walked around 20mins to two very good bistros which were filled with locals and not full of other tourists !
Happy "hour" every day from 5-7 on draught beers
Room service available for food as well.
Room Tip: Ask for on overlooking courtyard See more room tips
